pkgmetadata.longdescription: Aioaquarea===================Asynchronous library to control Panasonic Aquarea devices> :warning: This library is under development!Requires Python >= 3.9 and uses asyncio and aiohttp.## AcknowledgementsBig thanks to [ronhks](https://github.com/ronhks) for his awesome work on the [Panasonic Aquaera Smart Cloud integration with MQTT](https://github.com/ronhks/panasonic-aquarea-smart-cloud-mqtt).
